name: A banded jade coronet
data: It increases the users strength slightly.
It increases the users dexterity adequately.
It decreases the users constitution a bit.
It increases the users intelligence noticably.
It has weak armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration noticably.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'headcut'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'tameshivar'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'critical'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'doublehit'.
The coronet magically refreshes it's wearer's exhaustion.
